text:
="preserve">"Express Yourself" is a 1989 dance-pop song by Madonna. The lyrics are about female empowerment and inspire women to go for the best. The song was a tribute to American R&B-funk band Sly and the Family Stone.
The song peaked at #2 on the American "Billboard" Hot 100. It was certified Gold by the Recording Industry Association of America.
There are many versions of the song. One is almost eleven minutes long.
